expo.name: Variance
expo.description: Master blackjack card counting with comprehensive training tools, simulations, and progress tracking.

infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This identifier will be used to deliver personalized ads to you.

infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library for card images.
